content.question: The graph of the function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is shown above. The graph of <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> has horizontal tangent lines at <math alttext="x equals, negative 1.7 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1.7</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="x equals, negative 0.7 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.7</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="x equals 0 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="x equals 0.7 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="x equals 1.7 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Let <math alttext="g" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function defined by <math alttext="g of x, equals, the integral from, 0 to x, of, f of t, d t " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>. Of the following intervals, on which is the graph of <math alttext="g" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> both decreasing and concave up?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 1 comma negative 0.7, close parenthesis " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 0.7 comma 0, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.7</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.5: Interpreting the Behavior of Accumulation Functions Involving Area

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
